message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a good starting point, and I'm sure we can find a more agreeable solution as we go.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided.  Let's be fair - I propose a 70/30 split.  It's a good deal for both of us.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can come to an agreement.
Alice, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to compromise further. How about a 55/45 split? It's more balanced and moves us towards a fair agreement.
